title: Supernatural stars make ‘special bond’ permanent with matching tattoos
text:
Jensen Ackles, Jared Padalecki and Jeffrey Dean Morgan have all got matching tattoos (Picture: CW)

Three Supernatural cast members have marked their friendship with tattoos ahead of the 15th and final season airing.

Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles and their on-screen dad Jeffrey Dean Morgan all got permanent inkings – but exactly what artwork they opted for remains under wraps.

Jeffrey captured the unforgettable moment, which saw Jared raise a glass as he had his wrist marked, and shared a series of photos with his followers on Instagram.

‘Me and @hilarieburton weren’t the only ones joined for life…. @jaredpadalecki@jensenackles and myself will forever have a bond that is both special, and permanent. Love you both dearly,’ the actor captioned the pic.

Ugh, you’re killing us guys!

It was confirmed back in March that Supernatural would be coming to an end after being in our lives for 15 impressive series.

The cast announced the heartbreaking news in a video with Jared, who plays Sam Winchester, admitting that they’ve ‘cried some tears’ and that they’ll ‘probably cry some more.’

Thanks, Jared, we’re all crying now.

Talking about what’s in store for the finale, executive producer Andrew Dabb said at the 2019 Television Critics Association summer press tour: ‘We’re looking at this as a true ending.

‘And in a true ending, people can’t keep coming back over and over…They’re going to be facing life or death…This time it’s for real.’

Jensen added to EW: ‘The world has just opened up, essentially, and all of those things that we have spent so many years fighting, they’re going to come knocking now.

‘It’s going to be an all-out free-for-all. In my opinion, they’re teeing up what could possibly be the best season of the show.’

Time to prepare the tissues.

Supernatural season 15 airs tonight at 8pm on The CW in the US.
